name: Psi Special
description: Increases Psi by 1 point per hour to a maximum of 15. After 4 hours at 15, the effect wanes by 1 point per hour until Psi reaches 0. The rarest of psidrugs, special is available only in liquid form and must be taken by injection.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
